name: Hodie
description:
You've been discovered. The whole town is entering your home to hunt you down. Your canine blood is both a blessing and a curse.

Let the moonlight shafts hit you to temporally become a bloodthirsty werewolf without control of itself that will leap against the nearest fleshy being to saciate it's hunger.

Use this power with extreme care since as a werewolf, you won't distinguish between the dangerous people that are behind you and your own human childs.

---- Controls ----
(Supports keyboard and gamepads)

Move -> WASD or Left Stick

Follo/Unfollow child -> Space bar or A button
